attributes.action: introduce legislation to change the law so that whenever any government watchdog imposes a fine upon the BBC then that fine is delivered in the form of a refund to everybody who paid the BBC Licence Tax in that calendar year.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Government watchdogs are using fines upon taxpayer funded organisations as a cash cow for the Treasury.  To have ANY probity this government MUST change the law so that any fine upon the BBC is imposed as a refund to those people who have paid the BBC Licence Tax in that fiscal year.
